title: tomcc: 马上要发布新版本了
author: zx728925
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2016-8-9 16:37 编辑 

Tomcc：I'm back in the office and I just played a lot of Minecraft for the Oculus Rift... it's definitely ready for release :)
Tomcc：我已经回到了办公室，刚刚用了虚拟现实眼镜玩了一会儿Minecraft...一定是准备好发布新版本了
